title: Simplified full-site rebuild with admin dashboard

requirements.text: Update the Motoko backend actor to store: 15 products across 7 categories (Living Room, Bedroom, Kitchen, Outdoor, Office, Dining Room, Garden) with fields id, name, description, category, price (USD $100–$600), and imageUrl using Unsplash URLs; order storage with placeOrder mutation; contact form submission storage; and 4 sample blog posts with title, excerpt, body, author, date, and category. Expose query functions for all entities.
acceptanceCriteria: getProducts returns all 15 products
getProductsByCategory filters correctly
placeOrder stores an order and returns its ID
submitContact stores a contact message
getOrders, getContacts, getBlogPosts queries return correct data
4 blog posts are pre-populated

requirements.text: Build a fully navigable React frontend with React Router covering all routes: / (Home), /shop, /product/:id, /cart, /wishlist, /checkout, /about, /contact, /admin, /blog, /blog/:id. Apply the luxury ivory/beige/matte black/champagne gold theme with Playfair Display serif headings throughout all pages.
acceptanceCriteria: All routes render without errors
Header navigation links to all main pages
Luxury theme (ivory/beige/matte black/champagne gold) is consistent across all pages
Playfair Display or similar serif font used for headings

requirements.text: Build the Home page with: a cinematic full-width hero section with headline and CTA, a Featured Categories section (7 categories), a Best Sellers section (top 4 products), and a Testimonials section.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays with headline and CTA button
Featured Categories shows all 7 categories
Best Sellers displays 4 product cards
Testimonials section renders at least 3 testimonials

requirements.text: Build the Shop page at /shop with category filter tabs, price range filter, sort options (Newest, Best Selling, Price High–Low, Price Low–High), and a search bar that filters products in real time. Fetch products from the backend via React Query.
acceptanceCriteria: Category filter tabs update the displayed product list
Price range filter narrows results correctly
Sort options reorder products correctly
Search bar filters visible products in real time

requirements.text: Build the Product Detail page at /product/:id with product image, name, description, price (USD), category tag, Add to Cart button, Add to Wishlist button, a Shipping & Return info accordion, and a Related Products section showing up to 4 items from the same category.
acceptanceCriteria: Product data loads from backend by ID
Add to Cart adds the item to cart state
Add to Wishlist adds the item to wishlist state
Shipping & Return accordion expands/collapses
Related Products shows up to 4 items from the same category

requirements.text: Implement persistent Cart (React Context) and Wishlist state. Cart page at /cart shows items with quantity controls and subtotal. Wishlist page at /wishlist lists saved products with a Move to Cart option.
acceptanceCriteria: Cart persists across page navigations
Quantity controls update subtotal in real time
Wishlist items can be moved to cart
Empty cart and empty wishlist states are shown when applicable

requirements.text: Build the Checkout page at /checkout with guest form (name, email, shipping address), coupon code input applying a discount, order summary panel, and a Place Order button that calls placeOrder on the Motoko backend and shows a confirmation message.
acceptanceCriteria: Guest form fields are validated before submission
Valid coupon codes apply a discount to the order total
Place Order calls the backend placeOrder mutation
Confirmation message is displayed after successful order

requirements.text: Build the About Us page at /about with a brand story for Signature Home Decor LLP, a Vision & Mission section, and luxury editorial layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Brand story narrative is displayed
Vision & Mission section is present
Layout uses luxury editorial styling consistent with the site theme

requirements.text: Build the Contact page at /contact with a form (name, email, subject, message) that submits to the Motoko backend via submitContact, and a floating WhatsApp button opening wa.me with a pre-filled message visible on all pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form submits to the backend and shows a success message
WhatsApp floating button is visible on every page
WhatsApp link opens with a pre-filled message

requirements.text: Build the Admin Dashboard at /admin (no authentication required) with four tabs: Products (add/edit/delete), Orders (view all with status), Contact Submissions (view all), and Blog Posts (add/edit/delete). All data fetched from and written to the Motoko backend.
acceptanceCriteria: Products tab lists all products with Edit and Delete actions
New product form saves to backend
Orders tab lists all orders
Contact Submissions tab shows all messages
Blog Posts tab allows adding, editing, and deleting posts

requirements.text: Build the Blog listing page at /blog showing post cards in a grid, and individual post pages at /blog/:id displaying full post content. Data fetched from the Motoko backend.
acceptanceCriteria: Blog listing shows all 4 pre-populated posts as cards
Clicking a card navigates to /blog/:id
Individual post page displays title, author, date, body content

constraints: Keep total pre-populated products to 15 to avoid exceeding build budget
Keep blog posts to exactly 4 pre-populated entries
Do not add authentication to the admin dashboard
Do not edit files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
